description: Returns a list of image scan aggregations for your account. You can filter by the type of key that Image Builder uses to group results. For example, if you want to get a list of findings by severity level for one of your pipelines, you might specify your pipeline with the imagePipelineArn filter. If you don't specify a filter, Image Builder returns an aggregation for your account. To streamline results, you can use the following filters in your request:

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: A filter name and value pair that is used to return a more specific list of results from a list operation. Filters can be used to match a set of resources by specific criteria, such as tags, attributes, or IDs. name (string) --- The name of the filter. Filter names are case-sensitive. values (list) --- The filter values. Filter values are case-sensitive. (string) ---

nested_params.name: name
nested_params.description: The name of the filter. Filter names are case-sensitive.

nested_params.name: values
nested_params.description: The filter values. Filter values are case-sensitive.

nested_items.name: requestId
nested_items.description: The request ID that uniquely identifies this request.

nested_items.name: aggregationType
nested_items.description: The aggregation type specifies what type of key is used to group the image scan findings. Image Builder returns results based on the request filter. If you didn't specify a filter in the request, the type defaults to accountId.
accountId.
imageBuildVersionArn.
imagePipelineArn.
vulnerabilityId.

nested_items.name: responses
nested_items.description: An array of image scan finding aggregations that match the filter criteria.

nested_items.name: accountAggregation
nested_items.description: Returns an object that contains severity counts based on an account ID.

nested_items.name: accountId
nested_items.description: Identifies the account that owns the aggregated resource findings.

nested_items.name: severityCounts
nested_items.description: Counts by severity level for medium severity and higher level findings, plus a total for all of the findings.

nested_items.name: all
nested_items.description: The total number of findings across all severity levels for the specified filter.

nested_items.name: critical
nested_items.description: The number of critical severity findings for the specified filter.

nested_items.name: high
nested_items.description: The number of high severity findings for the specified filter.

nested_items.name: medium
nested_items.description: The number of medium severity findings for the specified filter.

nested_items.name: imageAggregation
nested_items.description: Returns an object that contains severity counts based on the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for a specific image.

nested_items.name: imageBuildVersionArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that identifies the image for this aggregation.

nested_items.name: severityCounts
nested_items.description: Counts by severity level for medium severity and higher level findings, plus a total for all of the findings for the specified image.

nested_items.name: all
nested_items.description: The total number of findings across all severity levels for the specified filter.

nested_items.name: critical
nested_items.description: The number of critical severity findings for the specified filter.

nested_items.name: high
nested_items.description: The number of high severity findings for the specified filter.

nested_items.name: medium
nested_items.description: The number of medium severity findings for the specified filter.

nested_items.name: imagePipelineAggregation
nested_items.description: Returns an object that contains severity counts based on an image pipeline ARN.

nested_items.name: imagePipelineArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that identifies the image pipeline for this aggregation.

nested_items.name: severityCounts
nested_items.description: Counts by severity level for medium severity and higher level findings, plus a total for all of the findings for the specified image pipeline.

nested_items.name: all
nested_items.description: The total number of findings across all severity levels for the specified filter.

nested_items.name: critical
nested_items.description: The number of critical severity findings for the specified filter.

nested_items.name: high
nested_items.description: The number of high severity findings for the specified filter.

nested_items.name: medium
nested_items.description: The number of medium severity findings for the specified filter.

nested_items.name: vulnerabilityIdAggregation
nested_items.description: Returns an object that contains severity counts based on vulnerability ID.

nested_items.name: vulnerabilityId
nested_items.description: The vulnerability Id for this set of counts.

nested_items.name: severityCounts
nested_items.description: Counts by severity level for medium severity and higher level findings, plus a total for all of the findings for the specified vulnerability.

nested_items.name: all
nested_items.description: The total number of findings across all severity levels for the specified filter.

nested_items.name: critical
nested_items.description: The number of critical severity findings for the specified filter.

nested_items.name: high
nested_items.description: The number of high severity findings for the specified filter.

nested_items.name: medium
nested_items.description: The number of medium severity findings for the specified filter.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The next token used for paginated responses. When this field isn't empty, there are additional elements that the service hasn't included in this request. Use this token with the next request to retrieve additional objects.
